```{r options, include=FALSE}

base::options(scipen=9999)

if(!exists("plotting_type") | !knitr::is_html_output()){
  plotting_type  <- "plot"  
} else{
plotting_type <- plotting_type}
tmap_mode(plotting_type)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

```
